Elegant Blade.name: Elegant Blade
Elegant Blade.flavor: A well-aimed blow briefly confounds your enemy as you easily slip into a better position.
Elegant Blade.requirement: The power Elegant Blade must be active in order to use this power.
Elegant Blade.onHit: You slide the target 3 squares, and you shift 3 squares as a free action.
Elegant Blade.trigger: The target willingly moves to a square that is not adjacent to you or makes an attack

Poetic Flourish.name: Poetic Flourish
Poetic Flourish.flavor: You perform a striking flourish after a successful attack and inspire your allies with a defiant swipe.
Poetic Flourish.requirement: The power Poetic Flourish must be active in order to use this power.
Poetic Flourish.trigger: You hit with a melee weapon attack
Poetic Flourish.effect: Until the end of your next turn, each target can reroll one damage die, using either result, each time he or she hit an enemy with an attack.

Deadly Deflection.name: Deadly Deflection

Deadly Deflection.trigger: An enemy adjacent to you targets you or an ally with a melee attack.
Deadly Deflection.effect: Choose a different creature within the target's reach. The target now attacks that creature instead.
